title: REORIA Women's Basic Sexy Lounge Slip Long Dress Elegant Sleeveless Backless Ribbed Bodycon Maxi Dresses
description: 🌸Ribbed material so soft that just snatches every inch of your body, and has quite a bit of a smoothing effect.
🌸This Basic elegant dress flares out at the bottom gives a mermaid look and hourglass body.Not too tight to walk and so cozy to wear all days.
🌸The straps can be adjusted for any figure! Perfect for every figure ladies. If worried about too long, you can bunch it up in your waist seamlessly so it’s not too long.
🌸Easy to dress up and dress down.Great for daily life, birthday, formal occasions, wedding guest, holiday, date nigh, night out, party, dating, brunch, and so on.
